text.*:
The Mediterranean Universities Union (Italian: Unione delle Università del Mediterraneo, UNIMED) consists of 84 universities based in the Mediterranean basin (or that have a specific interest in the Mediterranean region). The association has its head office in Rome.[1]

Contents

  • 1 Board
  • 2 UNIMED member universities
  • 3 References
  • 4 External links

Board[edit]

  • President: Prof. Abderraouf Mahbouli (University of Tunis, Tunis, Tunisia)
  • Vice President: Prof. Domenico Laforgia (University of Salento, Lecce, Italy)
  • Secretary General: Prof. Franco Rizzi (University of Rome III, Rome, Italy)
